name: Color to See Sharp
description:
Find your way through a world devoid of color!

Paint your surroundings with your paint gun in this synth-wavy third person exploration platformer and try to reach the Level Exit Gate in as little time as possible.

Soundtracks used:

https://www.free-stock-music.com/fsm-team-escp-kinetics.html

Kinetics by | e s c p | https://escp-music.bandcamp.com
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
